alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 12:19PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Armstrong, northern Randall, southwestern Carson and southeastern Potter Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1219 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Canyon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Canyon, Lake Tanglewood, Mescalero Park, Washburn, Umbarger, Timbercreek Canyon, and Pantex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Carson; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall
